topics.body:
I was just sleeping and I dreamt losing my left arm (slightly above the elbow) from an accident. It was extremely painful and I just can't explain it.

When I woke up, the extreme pain was still there and when I look back at my arm (which isn't lost), the pain rapidly decreased until it feels more like minor pain.

It still hurts but only a little now.

topics.body:

I don't get that last part though.

In other news, the pain on my elbow is gone.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f9a9736368724eacc81800#post_54f9a9736368724eacc81800
The last part says that the Vault Dweller killed those Raiders and conserved their brains for prolonged radiation exposeure research, which those are inside the bag. This is a reference to that one side quest that is divided in various parts where you need to help the girl to complete a Survival guide, and one of the missions are having a great amount of RAD in you body.

Good your pain is gone.
It seems you sleep in a incorrectly pose and you where hurting your elbow, and your brain woke up while you dreaming when you started to feel pain,

topics.body:
I really hate Mr. Krabs.
His cheap personality, despite being one of his values as a character, is way too excessive till he resorts to stealing, breaking into houses and slavery.

If they toned it down a bit then I might just like him.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f9b3aa6368727e83390700#post_54f9b3aa6368727e83390700
The "Raider with punk hair" design started since they appeared in MadMax 2, and due the movie's popularity, the design becomes popular too.

More when it appeared in other movies and an anime.

"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f9b5f26368722624cf0200#post_54f9b5f26368722624cf0200
Not only him.
Almost every character got flanderized.
